iti110:2.1: “Carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:2.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti.
iti110:2.3: Carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto anatapi anottapi satatam samitam kusito hinaviriyoti vuccati.
iti110:3.1: Thitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:3.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti.
iti110:3.3: Thitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto anatapi anottapi satatam samitam kusito hinaviriyoti vuccati.
iti110:4.1: Nisinnassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:4.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti.
iti110:4.3: Nisinnopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto anatapi anottapi satatam samitam kusito hinaviriyoti vuccati.
iti110:5.1: Sayanassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jagarassa uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:5.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu adhivaseti nappajahati na vinodeti na byantikaroti na anabhavam gameti.
iti110:5.3: Sayanopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jagaro evambhuto anatapi anottapi satatam samitam kusito hinaviriyoti vuccati.
iti110:6.1: Carato cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:6.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
iti110:6.3: Carampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto atapi ottapi satatam samitam araddhaviriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
iti110:7.1: Thitassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:7.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
iti110:7.3: Thitopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto atapi ottapi satatam samitam araddhaviriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
iti110:8.1: Nisinnassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:8.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
iti110:8.3: Nisinnopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evambhuto atapi ottapi satatam samitam araddhaviriyo pahitattoti vuccati.
iti110:9.1: Sayanassa cepi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jagarassa uppajjati kamavitakko va byapadavitakko va vihimsavitakko va.
iti110:9.2: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhu nadhivaseti pajahati vinodeti byantikaroti anabhavam gameti.
iti110:9.3: Sayanopi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jagaro evambhuto atapi ottapi satatam samitam araddhaviriyo pahitattoti vuccati”ti.
iti110:12.1: Yo ca caram va tittham va,
iti110:13.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
